info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Use this method to get IoT security Analytics metrics in an array.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Use this method to get IoT Security Analytics metrics.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Use this method to get the aggregated alert list of yours IoT Security solution.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Use this method to get a single the aggregated alert of yours IoT Security solution. This aggregation is performed by alert name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

post.description: Use this method to dismiss an aggregated IoT Security Solution Alert.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

200.description: This aggregate alert is permanently dismissed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Use this method to get the list of aggregated security analytics recommendations of yours IoT Security solution.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Use this method to get the aggregated security analytics recommendation of yours IoT Security solution. This aggregation is performed by recommendation name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: solutionName
parameters.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.

parameters.name: aggregatedRecommendationName
parameters.description: Name of the recommendation aggregated for this query.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

nextLink.description: When there is too much alert data for one page, use this URI to fetch the next page.

IoTSecurityAggregatedAlertList.description: List of IoT Security solution aggregated alert data.

alertDisplayName.description: Display name of the alert type.

count.description: Number of alerts occurrences within the aggregated time window.

description.description: Description of the suspected vulnerability and meaning.

effectedResourceType.description: Azure resource ID of the resource that received the alerts.

logAnalyticsQuery.description: Log analytics query for getting the list of affected devices/alerts.

systemSource.description: The type of the alerted resource (Azure, Non-Azure).

topDevicesList.description: 10 devices with the highest number of occurrences of this alert type, on this day.

alertsCount.description: Number of alerts raised for this device.

lastOccurrence.description: Most recent time this alert was raised for this device, on this day.

vendorName.description: Name of the organization that raised the alert.

IoTSecurityAggregatedAlertProperties.description: IoT Security solution aggregated alert details.

nextLink.description: When there is too much alert data for one page, use this URI to fetch the next page.

IoTSecurityAggregatedRecommendationList.description: List of IoT Security solution aggregated recommendations.

description.description: Description of the suspected vulnerability and meaning.

detectedBy.description: Name of the organization that made the recommendation.

healthyDevices.description: Number of healthy devices within the IoT Security solution.

logAnalyticsQuery.description: Log analytics query for getting the list of affected devices/alerts.

recommendationDisplayName.description: Display name of the recommendation type.

unhealthyDeviceCount.description: Number of unhealthy devices within the IoT Security solution.

IoTSecurityAggregatedRecommendationPrope.description: IoT Security solution aggregated recommendation information

alertsCount.description: Number of alerts raised for this device.

IoTSecurityAlertedDevice.description: Statistical information about the number of alerts per device during last set number of days.

IoTSecurityAlertedDevicesList.description: List of devices with open alerts including the count of alerts per device.

alertsCount.description: Number of alerts raised for this alert type.

IoTSecurityDeviceAlert.description: Statistical information about the number of alerts per alert type during last set number of days

IoTSecurityDeviceAlertsList.description: List of alerts with the count of raised alerts

devicesCount.description: Number of devices with this recommendation.

IoTSecurityDeviceRecommendation.description: Statistical information about the number of recommendations per device, per recommendation type.

IoTSecurityDeviceRecommendationsList.description: List of aggregated recommendation data, per recommendation type, per device.

IoTSecuritySolutionAnalyticsModel.description: Security analytics of your IoT Security solution

nextLink.description: When there is too much alert data for one page, use this URI to fetch the next page.

value.description: List of Security analytics of your IoT Security solution

IoTSecuritySolutionAnalyticsModelList.description: List of Security analytics of your IoT Security solution

devicesMetrics.description: List of device metrics by the aggregation date.

date.description: Aggregation of IoT Security solution device alert metrics by date.

unhealthyDeviceCount.description: Number of unhealthy devices within your IoT Security solution.

IoTSecuritySolutionAnalyticsModelPropert.description: Security analytics properties of your IoT Security solution

IoTSeverityMetrics.description: IoT Security solution analytics severity metrics.

TagsResource.description: A container holding only the Tags for a resource, allowing the user to update the tags.

AggregatedRecommendationName.name: aggregatedRecommendationName
AggregatedRecommendationName.description: Name of the recommendation aggregated for this query.

SolutionName.name: solutionName
SolutionName.description: The name of the IoT Security solution.
